actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that American oil companies should build additional refining capacity on existing refinery campuses.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that American oil companies should reinvest their profits into building additional refining capacity on existing refinery campuses so that the United States will become independent of foreign refineries and, in effect, help to reduce the current high price of gasoline.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that American oil companies should build additional refining capacity on existing refinery campuses.
